customer_reviews.text: I adore this shampoo. Prior to this I have tried every over the counter anti itch scalp treatment including holistic, and this is by and far the most effective. I plan on re purchasing this as long as they continue to produce it. I would also recommend their gel facial cleanser which is just as great.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Pivaral

customer_reviews.title: Try it if you have psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: I have severe psoriasis. I use both the shampoo and cream rinse. I am very satisfied with both.,
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Menthol has a bit of a feel (don't like menthol) and is a little hard on far ends ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that works. Menthol has a bit of a feel (don't like menthol) and is a little hard on far ends of hair, but tolerable. Would be find for short to medium hair. Be sure to leave on for 2-3 minutes in order to get effect. Shut your eyes tight when rinsing.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: I have psoriasis on my scalp - and this calmed it within about 2 treatments. Strong minty/tea tree fragrance, and it tingles a bit, i think that's how it works. Very good quality product for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Tea tree is strong on this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Duerma E is a brand I love but this shampoo didn’t work for my husband psoriasis, it made his scalp itch a lot and his dandruff was back the next day. The tea tree is strong, you feel it right away.

customer_reviews.text: I can definitely feel it working while shampooing with it. It dries out my hair too much, though. I can only use it 2 or 3 times a week. The conditioner is great, though.
